SELECT LS.SCREEN_GRANT_ID, DECODE(#language#, 'en', LS.SCREEN_GRANT_EN_NAME, LS.SCREEN_GRANT_NAME) SCREEN_GRANT_NAME, T.Supplier_GRANT_NO, (CASE WHEN INSTR(T.Supplier_GRANT_NO, ',' || LS.SCREEN_GRANT_ID || ',') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CHECKED FROM SY_LOGIN_SCREEN LS, (SELECT ',' || SCREEN_GRANT_ID || ',' AS Supplier_GRANT_NO FROM SY_ADMIN WHERE CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID:VARCHAR# AND ADMINLEVEL=1) T
WHERE 1=1
LS.ACTIVITY = #ACTIVITY#
ORDER BY LS.SCREEN_GRANT_NO
